CustomField.formula: AND( Account.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'HH_Account', ISPICKVAL(Account.Current_Ladder__c ,''), OR( Account.Annual_Giving_Rating__c = '1: $5,000+', Account.Annual_Giving_Rating__c = '2: $2,500 - $4,999', Account.Annual_Giving_Rating__c = '3: $1,000 - $2,499', (Account.Soft_Credit_in_Last_14_Months__c + Account.Hard_Credit_in_Last_14_Months__c >= 500)), OR( ISPICKVAL( Account.Donor_Level__c, 'No Designation'), ISPICKVAL( Account.Donor_Level__c, '')) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Any donor with Donor Level = No Designation with cumulative hard/soft credits of $500+ in the past 14 months or who has an Annual Giving Rating of 1,2, or 3
CustomField.label: Mid-Level Donor Prospect (Comms)
